recipesJson.name: Emma Watson
recipesJson.author: Silky
recipesJson.description:
A nice tropical grapefruit inhale with a sweet and sour lemon exhale. Honeysuckle mingles throughout and gives this vape a nice floral touch. WS-23 cools it and brings an icy touch. Delicious.

https://www.reddit.com/r/DIY_eJuice/comments/duhkly/emma_watson_a_citrus_vape

reviews.text: More Baudelairean odalisque than fresh-scrubbed Brit thespian... A tight, direct honeysuckle strain with a sour, juicy grapefruit throughout, like a fizz-less Italian soda, the guava spackling the citrus to the teeth. For me, this mix hints at the carnality of honeysuckle - a candle burning on the night stand, the linalool fog of a red light stroll, the scent of first perfumes, closet kisses - and I love it for that
